iWant: to know the limitation and strengths of the deployed chatbot
soThat: I am able to make informed decisions on how to use it and what to do with the information it provides
because: I know that chatbot interfaces can look very similar while providing hugely differing capabilities wrt trustfulness, reliability, hope, usefulness
desirable: Provide useful information about limitation and strengths at multiple levels of expertise and in multiple formats (video, texts)
dealBreakers: information missing or not comprehensible / to the varying levels of expertise / stakeholder

values.explanation: being required to inform oneself is a barrier
enables to reflect what chatbot perceives
transparency is one way of reaching accountability
that's what it's about, main claim
